title: Rename header dropdown to “Our Products”, make dropdown transparent, and show relevant category carousel on product pages

requirements.text: Update the header navigation dropdown label from “Categories” to “Our Products”.

quotes: Instead of the name Category. Replace the name as Our Products in header.

acceptanceCriteria: In the site header, the dropdown trigger text reads “Our Products” (not “Categories” or “Category”).
No other header labels are changed.

requirements.text: Make the header dropdown menu background transparent (the dropdown box itself).

quotes: Give a transparent background to the drop-down box

acceptanceCriteria: Opening the “Our Products” dropdown shows a transparent dropdown background (menu container), not an opaque panel.
Dropdown items remain readable and clickable.

requirements.text: Add a persistent category identifier to products so the app can determine a product’s relevant category for category carousel display. Ensure this category value is editable in the admin product management flow and is returned by product APIs.

quotes: Proceed and link the carousel of each category available in admin control to be visible when product page is open
2 only the carousel for relevant category

acceptanceCriteria: Backend Product data includes a category slug/identifier that can be stored per product.
Admin UI for creating/editing a product includes a control to set the product’s category slug (using the same slug values as the customer category routes).
Fetching a product via existing frontend hooks returns the product category value without breaking existing products (products created before this change continue to load).

requirements.text: On the product detail page, render only the category carousel(s) for the product’s relevant category (as configured via the existing admin category carousel management) at the top of the page content.

quotes: Proceed and link the carousel of each category available in admin control to be visible when product page is open
3 yes on top of each product page

acceptanceCriteria: When a product has a category slug set, the product detail page shows the category-specific carousel content at the top of the page (above the product media/details grid).
Only the carousel(s) for that single relevant category are shown (no other categories’ carousels).
If a product has no category slug set (legacy data), the product detail page does not crash and simply omits the category carousel section.

constraints: Frontend files under frontend/src/components/ui must not be edited directly; achieve styling changes by composing/overriding via className on consuming components (e.g., Layout).
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; only add backend/migration.mo if required for compatibility with existing stored state.
nonGoals: Do not add new category pages or change category routing behavior beyond what is needed to display the relevant category carousel on product detail pages.
Do not change how admin category carousel images are uploaded/reordered/enabled aside from using the existing configured data for display.
Do not implement showing all categories’ carousels on the product detail page.
